alert.note: Alert for Garfield (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 15 at 2:51PM MDT until September 15 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM MDT THIS AFTERNOON FOR SOUTH CENTRAL GARFIELD COUNTY... At 251 PM MDT, emergency management reported flash flooding occurring in Phipps Wash. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Emergency management reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of normally dry washes, slot canyons, and slick rock areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Phipps Wash, The Gulch, and other drainages in the upper Escalante. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Remain alert for flooding even in locations not receiving rain. Dry washes, streams, and rivers can become raging killer currents in a matter of minutes, even from distant rainfall.
